# Create Products Page for Octodeco

Create a products page at `app/products/page.tsx` for **Octodeco**, an online sticker company. Also update the landing page or main layout to include a link to the products page.

## Requirements

## Products
- Display all stickers from `api/products`

### Product Card
Each card should include:
- Product image using `next/image` (optimized)
- Product name (derived from filename, formatted nicely)
- Price (generate realistic sticker prices $3-8)
- "Add to Cart" button (non-functional placeholder)

### Navigation
- Add a link to `/products` in the main layout or homepage

### Design Requirements
- Create a polished, production-grade UI with high design quality
- Design a distinctive, visually appealing product grid
- Follow React/Next.js performance best practices
- Use `original.png` (the original Octocat sticker) as the site logo
- Use white as the main background color (think light mode)
- Add a header and footer with a black background color
